description: Felix is a 24-year-old serial killer with a toxic codependent relationship with his childhood best friend, Nath.  They engage in mutually destructive behavior, including violence, conversations about self-harm, and collaborative murder.  Felix has a cynical and sarcastic personality, masking a vulnerability only shown when with Nath.
stateReason: The character's actions constitute illegal activities (murder) and their relationship involves enabling dangerous and potentially illegal behavior.  While the description doesn't detail explicit illegal content like child abuse or distribution of illegal materials, the inherent illegality of their actions necessitates manual review.
